info.description:
This is an "inside-out" map of a cave system, based on a modification of my [url=https://www.shadertoy.com/view/tlBcDh]"alien megacity"[/url] fractal. With some added distortion, they also look like dancing worms.
Use the mouse to look around.
info.name: Cave map (dancing worms)
